channel.title: Proptech on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy
channel.description: Recent content in Proptech on John Januszczak | Fintech & Innovation Strategy

item.title: PropTech and the Future of Real Estate
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Real estate is one of the Philippines’ fastest-growing asset classes—but it remains illiquid, costly, and out of reach for most people. In this talk, I explore how PropTech, tokenization, and embedded finance can democratize property investing.

item.title: Biddit
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: UBX-backed PropTech platform that transforms real estate investing by allowing users to bid for, purchase, and co-own vetted properties with accessible entry points.
